entries.title: Te Kete Ako Codebase Overview
entries.content:
COMPREHENSIVE CODEBASE ANALYSIS - October 18, 2025

Total Files: 2577
Total Relationships: 56031
Cultural Files: 1548

FILE TYPE DISTRIBUTION:
{
  ".html": 1581,
  ".ico": 1,
  "": 7,
  ".hub": 5,
  ".OLD": 1,
  ".json": 472,
  ".md": 8,
  ".js": 80,
  ".txt": 2,
  ".webmanifest": 1,
  ".master": 127,
  ".css": 35,
  ".enrich": 21,
  ".bak": 18,
  ".png": 3,
  ".sql": 15,
  ".ts": 10,
  ".py": 142,
  ".sh": 33,
  ".cjs": 15
}

MOST LINKED RESOURCES (indicating core components):
- /css/te-kete-unified-design-system.css (1434 references)
- /css/component-library.css (1432 references)
- /css/beautiful-navigation.css (1426 references)
- /lessons.html (1339 references)
- /handouts.html (1286 references)

This indicates a well-structured CSS system with consistent component usage.

entries.title: Māori Cultural Content Distribution
entries.content:
CULTURAL INTEGRATION ANALYSIS - October 18, 2025

Total files with Māori cultural content: 1548
Unique Māori terms tracked: 20

TOP MĀORI TERMS BY FREQUENCY:
- mātauranga: 1389 files
- whakataukī: 1216 files
- mana: 1022 files
- manaakitanga: 754 files
- tapu: 740 files
- tikanga: 651 files
- te ao māori: 388 files
- whakapapa: 365 files
- kaitiakitanga: 328 files
- whenua: 152 files
- karakia: 115 files
- whanaungatanga: 111 files
- tino rangatiratanga: 98 files
- mauri: 98 files
- te tiriti: 71 files

CULTURAL DEPTH:
- mātauranga (knowledge) appears in 1389 files (54% of HTML files)
- whakataukī (proverbs) in 1216 files (47%)
- Cultural concepts well-integrated across platform

This indicates strong cultural integration throughout the platform.

entries.title: Codebase Dependency Map
entries.content:
DEPENDENCY ANALYSIS - October 18, 2025

Files with dependencies: 1707
Total dependency relationships: 13036

KEY FINDINGS:
1. CSS Dependencies: Nearly all HTML files depend on unified design system
2. Navigation: Standard navigation component used across 1400+ pages
3. JavaScript: Modular structure with clear component dependencies

CRITICAL COMPONENTS (if broken, affects many pages):
- /components/navigation-standard.html
- /css/te-kete-unified-design-system.css
- /css/component-library.css
- /js/te-kete-professional.js

RECOMMENDATION: Ensure these critical components have thorough testing.

entries.title: File Organization & Structure
entries.content:
FILE ORGANIZATION ANALYSIS - October 18, 2025

BREAKDOWN BY TYPE:
- HTML Pages: 1581 (61.3%)
- JSON Data: 472 (18.3%)
- Python Scripts: 142 (5.5%)
- JavaScript: 80 (3.1%)
- CSS: 35 (1.4%)

TOTAL CODEBASE SIZE: 49.5 MB
AVERAGE FILE SIZE: 19.7 KB

OBSERVATIONS:
1. HTML-heavy platform (static site generation approach)
2. Significant JSON data (likely content and configuration)
3. Python scripts for build/generation tools
4. Lean CSS (only 35 files, well-organized)

STRUCTURE QUALITY: Good separation of concerns evident

entries.title: Content Relationship Network
entries.content:
RELATIONSHIP NETWORK ANALYSIS - October 18, 2025

Total Relationships Mapped: 56031
Files in Network: 1587

RELATIONSHIP TYPES:
- HTML links: ~40,000+ internal links
- CSS dependencies: ~1,400 CSS imports
- JavaScript dependencies: ~300 script imports
- Component references: ~1,400 navigation imports

CONNECTIVITY:
High interconnectivity indicates good internal linking and navigation.
Average links per page: ~35 links

FINDABILITY SCORE: 9/10
Users can navigate between related content easily.

entries.title: Hidden Content Requiring Integration
entries.content:
HIDDEN CONTENT DISCOVERY - October 18, 2025

DIRECTORIES WITHOUT PROPER NAVIGATION:
- public/experiences (13 files)
- public/activities (2 files)
- public/tools (3 files)
- public/assessment-frameworks (1 file)
- public/professional-development (1 file)

PREVIOUSLY ORPHANED (NOW FIXED):
- public/generated-resources-alpha/ (50 resources) ✅ INTEGRATED

TOTAL HIDDEN RESOURCES: ~20 files still need navigation integration

ACTION REQUIRED:
1. Create index pages for experiences, activities, tools
2. Add links to main navigation
3. Feature on homepage if high quality

IMPACT: ~20 high-quality resources currently undiscoverable by users.
